DOC.brief_summary: This survey is conducted for preparing application material for re-examination under the Pharmaceutical Affairs Law and its Enforcement Regulation; its aim is to reconfirm the clinical usefulness of COZAAR XQ through collecting the safety and efficacy information according to the Re-examination Regulation for New Drugs.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Participant with essential hypertension Participant who is treated with COZAAR XQ within local label for the first time Exclusion criteria: Participant who is treated with COZAAR XQ before contract and out of enrollment period Participant who has a contraindication to COZAAR XQ according to the local label
